segments.text: What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to get my car washed .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you like regular car wash package ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't know what you mean .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , we will wash the exterior form top to bottom . We use a special shampoo , which gives the body that extra shine .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course . We wash the windows inside and out .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We use a vacuum cleaner that removes all the dirt , and we throw away all of the trash that we can find .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sounds good , regular car wash package will be OK .
segments.speaker: S2
